nodes.text: Star Wars Journeys: The Phantom Menace

Star Wars Journeys: The Phantom Menace is an iPhone app released on April 22, 2014 by Disney Publishing. It contains information pertaining to the film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, as well as a Pod Racing mini game. It was meant to be the first in a series of Star Wars Journeys apps, which will chronicle the first six released films in the main Star Wars saga. Star Wars Journeys: Beginnings followed it, and content from Star Wars Journeys: The Phantom Menace was included in it.
